name: NSViewAnimation.Key
desc: The following string constants are keys for the dictionaries in the array passed into init(viewAnimations:) and viewAnimations.

items.name: static let effect: NSViewAnimation.Key
items.desc: An effect to apply to the animation.

items.name: static let endFrame: NSViewAnimation.Key
items.desc: The size and location of the window or view at the end of the animation.

items.name: static let startFrame: NSViewAnimation.Key
items.desc: The size and location of the window or view at the start of the animation.
